subject: Another Hack
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Well... after much probing, proding, and soldering... I have hacked 
another AM/FM to do the ole' raw audio band sweep routine.  This was 
one of those "Made in China" AM/FM/Cassette combos.
Nothing like the clarity and smooth sweep operation of the Radio Shack 
Hack models 12-470 (older version) & 12-469 (clicking model)... but it 
provides those snippets and fragments some enjoy so much.

- Mike
